attributes.action: Remove the All-woman or All-men shortlists so that anyone can put themselves forward for nomination for election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order for the party to maintain quotas for men and woman MP's, constituencies like mine in NW Durham refuse to allow male candidates. I believe that irrespective of gender all candidates should be allowed to stand and whomever is the most suitable, albeit male or female should be selected by the NEC. 

This gives everyone incentive to get involved and potentially stand as an MP rather than discriminating on suitable members in a certain location because of their gender, when their efforts in the local communit and ability may warrant them to stand as PPC for the constituency.

Everyone should have the right to put themselves forward for nominaton and may the best candidate win. I have enough faith in good female candidates not to see a need to restrict males from standing in certain areas, and vice versa.
